text: (eninum,) evarkal panakkararkalakavum iruntu (porukkuc cellatirukka) um'mitam anumati kori (porukkuc cellatu vittil) tanki vitupavarkalutan tankalum iruntuvita virumpinarkalo avarkal mitutan kurram. Ivarkalutaiya ullankal mitu allah muttiraiyittu vittan. Akave, avarkal (itanal erpatum ilivai) arintukolla mattarkal
